issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
Hi,

I would like to perform profiling of my windows application. Appcelerator provides profiling for android and iOS through appcelerator and other tools(DDMS/XCODE).

Is there a way I can check performance and do memory usage analysis of my windows application through appcelerator or any other tool?

comments.body:
Hi [~neha],

App Profiling features is not available for Windows. 

Thanks
